title: Tour Around the City
description: Nairobi National Park, Bomas of Kenya, Ngong Hills, and Hell’s Gate National Park

title: Mombasa
description: Fort Jesus, Old Town, Diani Beach, Mombasa Marine National Park, and Nyali Beach

title: Malindi
description: Watamu Beach, Malindi Museum, and Watamu Marine National Parks

title: Lamu Island
description: Lamu Fort, Lamu Museum, and Manda Island

title: Wasini Island
description: Kisite Marine National Park, Shimoni Slave Caves, and Paradise Beach

title: Tour Around Western Kenya
description: Crying Stone of Ilesi, Mount Elgon National Park, Kakapel Cultural Centre, Aderema Hills

title: Northern Kenya
description: Reteti Elephant Sanctuary, Kalacha, Lake Turkana ‘The Jade Sea’, Sibiloi National Park, Sera Conservancy & Rhino Sanctuary

title: Central Province
description: Thomson Falls, Evergreen Park, Subukia Shrine, Kereita Cave and Waterfall, Kiambethu Farm
